#summary HOWTO install the class libraries.

= Introduction =

The core classes module contain the implementation of messages and classes that provide persistence*, transformations and reporting. This page shows how to install this module.

= Pre-requisites =

== System Requirements == 
Supported Operating Systems: Windows Server 2003; Windows Server 2008; Windows Vista; Windows XP 
Installed Software: Visual Studio 2008 Enterprise Edition (.NET Framework version 3.5 Service Pack 1)

= Installation =

There are two methods of installation:
* Via Setup Wizard
* Via simple File Copy

= Setup Wizard install =

# Download the Setup_CoreClassesVVVV.zip (VVVV = version number) archive and decompress it to a temporary directory;
# Run the setup program Setup1001.msi;
# Select a destination directory to the assemblies (.dll);
# Choose Everyone.

= File Copy install =

# Download the binVVVV.zip (VVVV = version number) archive and decompress it to the installation directory.

= Remarks =

The only thing that you have to make sure of in both cases is that all assembly files (.dll) of this module MUST be located on the same directory.
